cause.description:
To get some money together to help find the cause of SIDS(sudden infant death syndrome)
Most SIDS researchers currently believe that SIDS is due to some type of brainstem dysfunction or immaturity, which affects breathing and sleep. Yet, these observations of rapid deaths which can not be revived, even in a very timely manner, are troubling, as they do not seem to fit the theory that SIDS is simply due to stopping breathing. Thus, these observations are important. They are teaching us something about SIDS, we are just not smart enough to know what it is --- yet. It just shows that we have a way to go before we understand the cause of SIDS.
This is in Jaylen Cynthias name, 4 months old. February 12 2007-June 24 2007. Rest in Peace little lady, you will be forever missed and always in our hearts!
JUST SO EVERYONE KNOWS THIS WAS NOT MY DAUGHTER THAT HAS PASSED AWAY, I WONT SAY THEN NAME OF THE WOMAN BECAUSE IM NOT SURE IF SHE WANTS TO BE LEFT ANNONYMOUS. MY HEART WAS JUST REALLY HURT BY THE TRADGEDY, I FEEL FOR EACH ONE OF YOU EVERY SINGLE DAY. I CANT EVEN IMAGINE!! From the creator Rebecca Cook
1. we need a way for babies to stop passing
2. no one has found a cause of SIDS
cause.mission: Raise money to help research SIDS
cause.name: SIDS(Sudden Infant Death Syndrome) Research
